EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Avaloq - 2014.11.12.Email - Follow Up - No Shows
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you at our Webinar: Successful Test Automation using Tosca for Avaloq
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Successful Test Automation for Avaloq at LGT
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Sorry we missed you at our webinar “Successful Test Automation using Tosca for Avaloq”. LGT Group IT Business Professional, Martin Lanzerstorfer, and Tricentis’ very own Managing Consultant, Helmut Stueber, talked about how to leverage Tricentis Tosca Testsuite for Avaloq testing in LGT Group to optimize risk coverage and time to market. Questions from the audience made the discussion lively.
Want to see what you missed? Watch the recording here <http://www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts>. Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Martin Lanzerstorfer IT Business Professional LGT Financial Services AG
Helmut Stueber Managing Consultant Tricentis
